Unplayable.
clockworkchar:Part: clockworkchar:Spin 4.

clockworkchar:Spin 4: Deal 7 (9) damage.
clockworkchar:Spin 4: Gain 6 (8) Block.

clockworkchar:Spin 6: Add a Sawblade into your hand.

clockworkchar:Spin 3 (2): Apply 2 Weak.
clockworkchar:Spin 3 (2): Apply 2 Vulnerable.

clockworkchar:Wind_Up 3 (5).
Deal 9 (12) damage.

Deal 16 (20) damage.
Draw 2 cards.
Discard 2 cards.

cards.name: Lost Cog
cards.description:
Deal 6 (8) damage.
If the last card you played this combat clockworkchar:Spun, deal 6 (8) damage again.

cards.name: Mend
cards.description:
clockworkchar:Actuate.
clockworkchar:Attune 1 (2) card (cards) at random.

cards.name: Quick Fix
cards.description:
Deal 4 (7) damage.
clockworkchar:Actuate.

cards.name: Ready Up
cards.description:
clockworkchar:Wind_Up 10 (14).
Next turn, gain [E].

cards.name: Rearrange
cards.description:
Deal 8 (11) damage.
Swap the positions of a card in your discard pile and a card in your draw pile.

cards.name: Scatter Nails
cards.description:
Deal 3 (4) damage to ALL enemies.
At the start of their turn, they lose 1 (2) HP.

cards.name: Solder

Gain 8 (10) Block.
clockworkchar:Wind_Up 3 (5).

cards.name: Swift Stomps

Deal 4 (5) damage.
clockworkchar:Spin 2: Deal 4 (5) damage.
clockworkchar:Spin 2: Deal 4 (5) damage.

cards.name: Teddy Bear

Gain 4 (5) Block.
Can be clockworkchar:Attuned at Rest Sites any number of times.

cards.name: Tinker
cards.description:
Gain 8 (12) Block.
clockworkchar:Attune all cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

cards.name: Twisting Strike
cards.description:
Deal 5 (8) damage to a random enemy.
Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Unleash Rage
cards.description:
Deal 8 (11) damage.
clockworkchar:Part: Next turn, gain 2 (3) temporary Strength.

cards.name: Whirl
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage to ALL enemies twice.
clockworkchar:Spin 2: Draw 1 (2) card (cards).

cards.name: As Far as it Goes
cards.description:
Gain 4 (7) Block.
Shuffle any number of cards from your discard pile into your draw pile.

cards.name: Cogwheels

cards.name: Crunch Battery

clockworkchar:Wind_Up 5.
Gain 1 (2) Strength.

(Innate.)
clockworkchar:Equip a clockworkchar:Torch.

Deal 28 (35) damage.
Cannot bring enemies below 1 HP.
End your turn.

Deal 12 (15) damage to ALL enemies.
clockworkchar:Wind_Up 8 (10).

Retain.

Activate and discard all clockworkchar:Parts in your hand.
Deal 4 (6) damage and draw a card for each card discarded.

cards.name: Fool Me Twice
cards.description:
Deal 8 (10) damage 1 time.
clockworkchar:Spin 4: Increase this card's hits by 1 this combat.

cards.description:
Draw 2 (3) cards.
clockworkchar:Part: Draw 2 cards and Retain them.

cards.name: Gather Parts
cards.description:
Deal 16 (18) damage.
If Fatal, heal 6 (8) HP and Exhaust.

cards.name: Greased Cogs
cards.description: Whenever you clockworkchar:Spin, gain 2 (3) Block.

Unplayable clockworkchar:Part:
clockworkchar:Spin 2 to deal 6 (9) damage to a random enemy and Retain this.

cards.name: Kinetic Servo
cards.description:
Gain 12 (15) Block.
Whenever you are attacked this turn, clockworkchar:Wind_Up 3 (4).

cards.name: Mecha Manoeuvre
cards.description:
Gain 8 (10) Block.
clockworkchar:Spin 4 (3): Gain [E].

cards.name: Mesmerise
cards.description:
Apply 2 Weak and 1 clockworkchar:Dizzy to ALL enemies.

Exhaust.

Gain 8 (11) Block.

(Innate.)
clockworkchar:Equip an clockworkchar:Allen_Key.

cards.name: Peep the Haul!
cards.description: At (Now)  (and at) the end of your turn, shuffle 1 random clockworkchar:Trinket into your draw pile.

cards.name: Potential Energy
cards.description: For every 5 clockworkchar:Charge you have, clockworkchar:Spin 1 to gain [E].

cards.name: Precise Tuning
cards.description:
Deal 7 (9) damage.
Draw 4 (5) cards.
Discard all cards drawn this way that aren't clockworkchar:Attuned.

cards.name: Reassemble
cards.description: Put ALL clockworkchar:Parts from your  (draw and) discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Rejig
cards.description: clockworkchar:Spin 5: Gain 3 (4) Strength.

cards.name: Resonance
cards.description:
Ethereal.
clockworkchar:Spin 1.
If you've already played this card at least 2 times, gain 25 (35) Block.

cards.name: Rewinder
cards.description:
Retain.
Unplayable clockworkchar:Part:
clockworkchar:Spin 3 (2) to Retain another card.

cards.description:
Add a Sawblade into your hand.
clockworkchar:Spin 8 (4): Play the top 2 cards of your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Salvage
cards.description:
Deal 12 (16) damage.
clockworkchar:Equip a random Tool.

cards.name: Synchronise
cards.description:
clockworkchar:Attune an Attack or Skill.
clockworkchar:Spin 8: Add a copy of it into your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.description:
Deal 9 (12) damage.
clockworkchar:Attune this card 2 times.

cards.name: Vexing Glare
cards.description: Whenever clockworkchar:Parts are activated, deal 2 (3) damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Whir
cards.description:
Repeat 3 (4) times:
clockworkchar:Spin 2: Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Worm Gear
cards.description: Draw 1 card. If it's a clockworkchar:Part, activate it  (2 times) and repeat this, otherwise discard it.

cards.name: Advance
cards.description:
Draw 1 card.
clockworkchar:Spin 6 (4): Gain [E] and add a copy of this card into your hand with 2 extra clockworkchar:Spin cost.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Boosted Blow
cards.description: clockworkchar:Let_Go: Deal damage equal to 2 times clockworkchar:Charge spent.

cards.name: Cog Surge
cards.description:
Deal 12 (16) damage.
clockworkchar:Spin 4: Gain 1 Artifact.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Crank
cards.description:
clockworkchar:Wind_Up 35 (45).
Exhaust.

cards.name: Dangerous Deterrent
cards.description:
Lose 4 (2) HP.
Add 3 Sawblades into your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Diligent Work
cards.description: At the start of your turn, clockworkchar:Actuate X~~- !M! -~~  times.

cards.name: Efficiency
cards.description: When clockworkchar:Parts are activated, activate them an additional time.

cards.name: Inertia
cards.description:
Whenever you clockworkchar:Wind_Up, you have 4 (5) additional Strength until you next clockworkchar:Spin.
clockworkchar:Wind_Up 1.

cards.name: Machinic Modification
cards.description:
Choose a card. Permanently give it clockworkchar:Wind_Up 2 (3).
Fleeting.

cards.name: Many Movements
cards.description:
clockworkchar:Spin 2 for each:
Deal 4 (6) damage.
Gain 4 (7) Block.
Apply 2 Weak.
Apply 2 Vulnerable.
Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Masterwork
cards.description: clockworkchar:Spin 30 (25): clockworkchar:Attune your hand, draw pile, and discard pile.

cards.name: Perpetual Form
cards.description:
At the start of your turn, lose [E] [E].
Gain 6 (8) clockworkchar:Cogwheels. Cards can now be played with clockworkchar:Charge (8 clockworkchar:Charge per [E]).

cards.name: Pitch Point
cards.description:
Deal 4 (6) damage.
clockworkchar:Wind_Up 1.
Whenever you clockworkchar:Spin, return this from the discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Reinforce
cards.description: clockworkchar:Let_Go: Gain 1 Plated Armor per 4 (3) clockworkchar:Charge spent.

cards.name: Scanner
cards.description: After you play a card, clockworkchar:Attune it.

cards.name: Tip
cards.description:
Deal 10 (14) damage.
clockworkchar:Spin 6: Enemy loses 2 Strength.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Wear and Tear
cards.description:
Deal 8 (10) damage 3 times.
Exhaust.
clockworkchar:Part: Gain 1 Strength.

relics.name: Salvaged Hand
relics.description: At the start of combat, clockworkchar:Wind_Up 8.
relics.flavorText: "It's my dominant hand, but I can't say it's my favourite." - Cranky

relics.name: Scrap Metal
relics.description: Start each combat with 1 additional clockworkchar:Cogwheel.
relics.flavorText: Picking stuff up from the floor, eh? Suit yourself.

relics.name: Swiss Army Knife
relics.description: clockworkchar:Attune the first card in each future card reward.
relics.flavorText: Passed down from great grandcrank, to grandcrank, to crank, and now bestowed upon you. Use it for good.

relics.name: Belt Drive
relics.description: Whenever you play 3 Skills in a row, draw 2 cards.
relics.flavorText: Who doesn't love a bit o' wearable tech?

relics.name: Seven Segment Display
relics.description: At the end of your turn, for every 5 clockworkchar:Charge you have stored, deal 1 damage to all enemies.

relics.name: Instruction Booklet
relics.flavorText: Trust me, don't just skip to the good bits.

relics.name: Oil Canister
relics.description: At the start of combat, shuffle 2 random clockworkchar:Trinkets into your draw pile.

relics.name: Diamond-Tipped Drill
relics.description: Replaces Salvaged Hand. Whenever you play a card, clockworkchar:Wind_Up 1.

relics.name: Floppy Disk
relics.description: Up to 50 clockworkchar:Charge is now conserved between combats. Starts with 20 clockworkchar:Charge stored.

relics.name: Gearbox
relics.description: The first time you clockworkchar:Wind_Up each turn, gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: This one may have fallen apart.

relics.name: Torque Wrench
relics.description:
Unplayable clockworkchar:Parts can now be played.
Whenever you play a card, activate its clockworkchar:Part effect.
relics.flavorText: Can dismantle even the grumpiest Crankies.

potions.name: Spare Nails
potions.description: Choose 1 of 2 Tools to Equip. Attune all cards in your hand.

potions.name: Spinner
potions.description: Shuffle 2 Sawblades into your draw pile. Whenever you draw a Sawblade this combat, draw 1 card.

keywords.name: Actuate
keywords.description: Activate the effect of your equipped Tool. Spanner is the default tool.

keywords.name: Allen Key
keywords.description: Tool. 1 Block, 1 damage, adds 2 additional damage to your next attack.

keywords.name: Attuned
keywords.description: Attuned cards Actuate after they're played or their part effect is activated.

keywords.name: Battery
keywords.description: The next time you try to Spin without enough charge, a Battery will be consumed to supply that much charge.

keywords.name: Charge
keywords.description: A secondary resource, displayed above energy. Gained by Winding Up.

keywords.name: Cogwheels
keywords.description: Cogwheels passively grant Charge at the start of your turn.

keywords.name: Dizzy
keywords.description: When attacked, creatures lose 1 Strength for that turn per stack of Dizzy.

keywords.name: Equip
keywords.description: Activate the effect of the currently equipped tool twice, then replace it with a new one.

keywords.name: Let Go
keywords.description: Spend ALL charge to perform an action.

keywords.name: Part
keywords.description: Parts are cards which activate to perform an effect if in your hand at the end of your turn.

keywords.name: Proficiency
keywords.description: Proficiency increases the damage and Block of Tools.

keywords.name: Spin
keywords.description: Spend charge to perform an action.

keywords.name: Torch
keywords.description: Tool. 2 Block, 0 damage, increases the damage dealt by tools to the enemy damaged by 1 for the turn.

keywords.name: Trinket
keywords.description: Trinkets are cards which draw a card when drawn, and Exhaust when their part effect is activated.

keywords.name: Wind Up
keywords.description: Turn your winder, gaining some amount of charge.

packs.name: Tools
packs.description: Improve your cards to reach their fullest potential.
packs.author: ocean

augments.name: Familiar
augments.description:
Reduces Block and damage by 20%.
Attuned.

augments.name: Electric
augments.description:
Increases cost by 1.
Sets Spin cost to 0.

mods.name: Cranky
mods.credits:
Extra card art: NuclearCyborg, Carbon the Wanderer
Playtesting: TheRealEvab, NuclearCyborg, Carbon the Wanderer, LXIXCDXX
Audio: freesound.org (more info on workshop page)
mods.description: A Slay the Spire character who winds themself up to gain charge, a secondary energy resource.
